original: Fahle, Gustaf Adolf Emanuel, konstnär, Norrköping, f. 2/4/06 i Norrköp. av Carl Alfred F. o. Anna Mathilda Jansson. G. 38 m. Valborg Tibblin. Barn: Sigyn f. 42. ■— Konst-sk. i Sthlm 29-31. Stud:res. t. Holl., Frankr, (Maison Watteau i Paris) 0. Span. 31 o. 32. Ostgöta konstfören. stip. 34. Utställn. i, Norrköp. 33, 40 o. 44, Gävle 34, Örebro 38 o. Linköp. 41. Repr. på Norrköp. o. Linköp. mus.
translated: Fahle, Gustaf Adolf Emanuel, artist, Norrköping, born April 2, 1906, in Norrköping to Carl Alfred F. and Anna Mathilda Jansson. Married Valborg Tibblin in 1938 and had one child, Sigyn, born in 1942. Attended art school in Stockholm from 1929-1931 and studied in the Netherlands, France (at the Maison Watteau in Paris), and Spain in 1931 and 1932. Received a stipend from the Ostgöta Art Association in 1934. Exhibited artwork in Norrköping in 1933, 1940, and 1944, Gävle in 1934, Örebro in 1938, and Linköping in 1941. Artwork represented in the collections of the Norrköping and Linköping museums.
